job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: strongAbout Stellar HealthbrbrstrongHealthcare costs are one of the biggest problems in the United States today At Stellar Health we are building a platform that helps Healthcare Providers doctors and support staff improve the quality of care they provide while also reducing their costs In the end these improvements make patients healthierbrbrStellar Healths product is actively used by over 300 Medical Groups  and we have shown that we make a real difference for these practices and their patientsbrbrIts an exciting time to join the Stellar Team we have an established product proven operating model and we are well fundedbrbrstrongWere hiring Software EngineersbrstrongStellar Health is hiring experienced Software Engineers for our NYC based team As a Software Engineer you will develop core features of our healthcare platform The Stellar Engineering Team offers an experienced and mature engineering culture product development best practices and an environment where every single engineer has a direct impact on the success of our business Every team member regardless of seniority has the opportunity to have a direct measurable impact on the productbrbrWe look for engineers who write clean scalable code and contribute to our collaborative team culturebrbrstrongWho will love this jobbrbrstrongul liYou thrive off of supporting your peers and teammates no job is too small for youli liYou get things done and you love working in a dynamic environment we move quickly and we need a teammate who will tooli liYou understand appreciate and enjoy the responsibility and accountability that comes with being assigned high level ownership over projects and their successli liYou have a knack for explaining technical processes concisely even to nonengineers and work well with crossfunctional internal teamsli liYou are looking to learn and grow knowing that this position will involve a lot of ambiguity to deal with with the support from the organization to help you navigate itli brulstrongWhat youll dobrbrstrongul liOwn building and delivering big parts of our core product against business needsli liWrite clear and concise production code for the Stellar Health Platformli liProvide effective and constructive feedback by reviewing others workli liDeliver new features by collaborating regularly with our founding teamli liSet consistent standards for code testing and fixing bugs throughout the processli liWork with our founding team on defining product roadmaps specifications and prioritiesli liGather data insights and build models for product improvements or for internal useli brulstrongYou should havebrbrstrongul li25 years experience writing production code required li liExperience with Django or other webbased frameworks preferred but not a mustli liPython experience or experience with other backend languages Java  C  Go  Ruby and a desire to learnli liSome understanding of Javascript fundamentalsli brulstrongPay Perks amp SuchbrbrstrongWe offer a full slate of benefits including competitive salaries stock options medical dental vision life and disability coverages a 401k program and flexible vacationbrbrstrongNote on COVID response brbrstrongAt this time Stellar is offering a hybrid work environment for those employees who wish to go into our office We will not be requiring employees to work from our office until 2022 If you would like to learn more about our COVID response measures and Return to Office plans please mention this when you speak with a Stellar RecruiterbrbrstrongDiversity is the key to our successstrong Stellar Health is an equal opportunity employer and we are open to all qualified applicants regardless of race color ancestry religion sex national origin sexual orientation age citizenship marital status disability gender identity or expression veteran status or any other legally protected statusbrbrWe believe that diverse teams and the different identities cultures and life experiences our team members bring to the table enable us to create amazing products find creative solutions to interesting problems and build an inclusive working environmentbrbrWe encourage everyone to apply to our roles even if they do not meet every single qualification on a job description and our team is committed to reviewing every resume submitted
